contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of April, 2015, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to the remaining issue. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:
Whether the Superior Court’s conclusion that [respondent] was entitled to coram nobis review conflicts with the holdings of the Pennsylvania Supreme Court in Commonwealth v. Ahlborn and Commonwealth v. Hall as well as prior Superior Court precedent?
